question:
[Helen] and her husband [Johnny] wanted a child badly [Lee] went to dinner with her daughter [Kecia]. They then went to the park afterwards. [Matthew] took his sister [Lee] out to lunch after learning that she got accepted into her first choice for university. [Matthew]'s aunt, [Helen], took him fishing [James] and his wife [Dorothy] went to the supermarket. [Dorothy]'s daughter [Kecia] was home sick with the flu.
Question: How is [Johnny] related to [James]?

- Since [James] is the husband of [Dorothy], and [Dorothy] is the niece of [Helen], then [James] is the husband of the niece of [Helen].

Step 4: Based on the relationships identified, determine the relationship between [Johnny] and [James]:
